LanguageData.MO_AbominationRace.label: Abomination
LanguageData.MO_AbominationRace.description: Abominations are slow, hulking, relentless manifestations of flesh. Their bodies twist and contort to heal even major wounds quickly. Their mangled maw seeps with toxic bile. They will consume and assimilate, corpse by corpse.
LanguageData.MO_AbominationRace.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.MO_AbominationRace.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.MO_AbominationRace.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.MO_AbominationRace.tools.3.label: head
